website_summaries.verdict: The Dell Venue 8 Pro 3000 Series is an 8-inch Windows slate tablet featuring a sharp In-Plane Switching (IPS) screen and a sub-$100 price. It's a sweet deal if you're on a strict budget.

customer_reviews.title: good product, got Windows 8
customer_reviews.text: good product, got Windows 8.1, the windows store is limited for practical purposes, BofA is the only banking app and my Stock Broker's app is not available. IPad has them all, but my computers are all windows so I wanted the integration and did not fully get that. I have had an android phone and they have the apps I use, but I got real tired of android. so I did not want the Android OS for my tablet.
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Screen broke from light pressure when playing a game after three weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Screen broke with just a minor amount of pressure from playing a game. Had it for three weeks and kaput. Purchased a plan as insurance in case something did happen and never got a response from them. Bummer because I lost all the games I was playing and had scores on.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineShopper

customer_reviews.title: One of the better Windows tablets
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an HP Stream 7 which I gave to my son. Used at $83.70 was a $51.30 savings off the Amazon price ($140.29 off original) Pros: Nice design, textured back makes it easy to hold, thin but not too thin, light enough. Responsive buttons, only slight delay on power button and all on one place. Display was sharp and sound is clear. Set-up was a breeze. Cons: App fonts are still too small despite 125% zoom, battery drains quick.
customer_reviews.author: Domo Mamba

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible!! I purchase this tablet, set it up, and left it in my desk drawer for four months......most of my devices are apple based and I never took the time to explore my new Dell tablet. Well, I charged it and could never get it to boot up. It will flash the Dell logo and return black. After a little research, I found out it is a common problem with this product. It's been 5 months since I purchased it. I will check to see if it's still under warranty and if the issues can be resolved.
customer_reviews.author: S Love

customer_reviews.title: The tablet works good. Make sure you install your apps before upgrading ...
customer_reviews.text: The tablet works good. Make sure you install your apps before upgrading to Windows 10. Some older ones don't recognise it & won't download but will work if previously loaded. You'll also need to clear out memory once you're sure your staying with 10. The 2 os are kept until you do & this takes up all your memory
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this product is good.
customer_reviews.text: THoguht something was wrong with it at first, but after reading reviews, windows update kept screwing the tablet turning it to black screen mode. After some luck and able to get in without going on black screen mode, i did a hard reset, turn windows update, and its been black screen free for 90 percent. Sometimes it still goes to the black screen mode, but rarely. Other than that, this product is good.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great device.
customer_reviews.text: Tablet PC works fantastic and I will recommend it to my clients and friends. This is the second one I've purchased, bought the first for a gift and after setting up, I liked it so well I bought myself one.
customer_reviews.author: G R Bell

customer_reviews.title: Nice mini-computer
customer_reviews.text: Really great tablet. It won't do everything my son expects from an android (games and such), but it takes great pictures and records his rail-fan experiences.
customer_reviews.author: Casandra Buckner

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: bad deal... it was register to someone else already so dell wouldn't support it. bad deal
customer_reviews.author: Michael Muscarella

customer_reviews.title: Awful ZERO stars.
customer_reviews.text: avoid buying this item, lots of issues, not worth the hassle, warranty dept will give you the run around to avoid sending you a shipping label to repair the item. i have requested a full refund from dell
customer_reviews.author: Alex Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Love the price, size, the clarity, the ease of use. It met all of my expectations and needs - until - the motherboard crashed and had to be replaced. Dell was wonderful about the repair but I lost all of my pictures and data. I would still recommend the Venue but I will back up my data from now on.
customer_reviews.author: katrinka

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Got. This for my mother for Christmas she loved it and used it until she couldn't Any more. The battery life was alright it didn't freeze much only every now and then when she had to many files open at once. It's not to big and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: She'Oni Victoria

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for my grandkids to play their games on
customer_reviews.text: I'm always leary of buying electronics online but these weren't that expensive so I thought I might as well. They are perfect for my grandkids to play their games on. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Julia M. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: ... owned another tablet but this one seems to be pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned another tablet but this one seems to be pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Shaughnessy

customer_reviews.title: It is what you make of it.
customer_reviews.text: A very handy tablet, especially when paired with a proper Bluetooth mouse,, Keyboard and CaseThe mini USB that is used to charge the device also acts as a full USB port with a (sold separately) adapter. If the display doesn't suit you, there is always the option to connect it to any HDMI capable monitor using the proper cable.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Andreae

customer_reviews.title: Unit wouldn't stay powered on. Charged all night. ...
customer_reviews.text: Unit wouldn't stay powered on. Charged all night. After the third attempt it would not power on at all. I had to return it. Waist of time & money.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. TJ. Shepard

customer_reviews.title: I purchased 4 of these only one is working, ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 of these only one is working, 30 days later, save your money dell should be ashamed for making this item!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Old computers
customer_reviews.text: Poor battery life, have to have plug connect at all times

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't charge anymore. Had for less than a year

customer_reviews.title: I love the tablet
customer_reviews.text: I love the tablet, it's practical and convenient. I love the size. I am only having a problem figuring out how I get free trial of office 365.

customer_reviews.title: very hurt and disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: After having it for two months it rarely worked and now the screen don't turn on at all.

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery, I really like that. So far this product has been great. No complaints. Hope it stays that way.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tablet sucks but it's not the shippers fault dell sells garbage
customer_reviews.author: Jvan S.

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than a Kindle, but much more versitile and cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: Far better than Android. The only gripe I have is I keep accidentally turning it on when putting it in my Belkin case.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super Fast shipping, Item is as described, great transaction!! Thanks!!!

customer_reviews.title: This product didn't last very long... after ...
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't last very long...after a while, it died on me so that whenever I turned it on, it couldn't even completely open a single app.

customer_reviews.title: cool. Some learning curve
customer_reviews.text: Windows in a tablet...cool. Some learning curve, but lots of functionality.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product for price, not the easiest thing to use in all respects however.

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: I went through two of these. After that, I bought an iPad.
customer_reviews.author: GOTYER6

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have to do school work a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Great if you have to do school work a lot and don't want to sit at the desk all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my first Windows 8. 1 tablet. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Windows 8.1 tablet. Really convenient to be able to have the same programs I have running on my work computer on this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Rupert Mosley

customer_reviews.title: that 1GB of memory gets bogged down pretty quickly, so it takes some strategy keeping your ...
customer_reviews.text: Functions perfectly for office applications, web browsing, LIGHT gaming. The fatal flaw of this machine is the lack of a standard-sized USB port. No USB2 or 3, ugh. I guess Dell wants you to make up for the money you saved buying a smaller tablet buy selling you HUGELY overpriced Bluetooth peripherals, because micro-USB peripherals are practically nonexistent. Also, that 1GB of memory gets bogged down pretty quickly, so it takes some strategy keeping your RAM in check. I bought a refurb model for $75, and I'd say that's a fair price, but don't shell out much more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Butterfingers

customer_reviews.title: It is not working properly and the microphone will not ...
customer_reviews.text: It is not working properly and the microphone will not work. It shuts down randomly and says that it needs a software update even though there is not update to be done.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: This was the second one I received. The first ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the second one I received. The first one lasted a couple days and would then not turn on. The second one lasted 3 months and then the exact same problem. Past the return window, so no refund.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Product has battery failure and in less than two months ...
customer_reviews.text: Product has battery failure and in less than two months it stopped working. I haven't received the warranty that I purchased and I have not been able to make a return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really liked this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this tablet. It is great and has made it very convenient for me to work from home with my work out of the area.

customer_reviews.text: 3 months in and the tablet is working out just great.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tablet! this is my second one and would ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tablet! this is my second one and would recommend it to anyone. Consider an additional 32G memory if you want plenty of storage and/or upgrade to Windows 10.

customer_reviews.title: it's a tablet. it works. no problems. ...
customer_reviews.text: it's a tablet. it works. no problems. now has win 10.

customer_reviews.title: This model is quite a bit slower than the 5000 ...
customer_reviews.text: This model is quite a bit slower than the 5000 (as expected) but has some quirks. I found the screen quality to also be lesser than my 5000, the colors are very off, blues almost purple in comparison. They also randomly decided to switch the placement of the power and start buttons.

customer_reviews.title: dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: am a little dissapointed in the item because it took me long stree to get it to point of usage and i later discover that the tab doesnt have sim port.... very dissapointing

customer_reviews.text: This unit locked up and would not work. I returned it. Dell should take this off the market.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, I received the tablet on time and it works beautifully.

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use since I am already familiar with Windows Phone. I also enjoyed how to use videos.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I recommend getting this tablet with an sd card other than that great tablet

customer_reviews.text: One big piece of junk. Had problems from day one and when returned even though it was past the standard 30 days I had to pay a restock fee for something that can't be resold

customer_reviews.text: I give this a one star because it just last me one month and it died not sure if there is any warranty on this product

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: I buy for my brother who go to university and he love it, it work perfect for document, internet.

customer_reviews.title: Great tab, better price
customer_reviews.text: This is a fast, affordable tablet that can be upgraded to Windows 10. Beware though, to be able to do that you will need more than the supplied 32GB. As a matter of fact, storage space is my only complaint. Thankfully, 128GB SD cards are a thing.
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Screen does not work
customer_reviews.text: Did not work!! The screen died in the first week of use. I returned it

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough screen
customer_reviews.text: Decent speed. Nice enough screen. Price was great. Windows 8.

customer_reviews.title: don't bother with windows 8.1
customer_reviews.text: lets just be honest. windows 8.1 SUCKS for a tablet. The hardware seemed ok but there were times when the power button didn't respond. I got a samsung tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Stenhouse Wells

customer_reviews.title: Dell Venue 8 Pro with Windows 8.1
customer_reviews.text: I just brought New Dell Venue 8 Pro really lightweight comes with Windows 8.1 then iOS, Android and Blackberry OS problem Touchscreen devices also working with Bluetooth Devices as my Bluetooth Stereo Headphone hearing Music Internet radio for using Desktop if does Metro Internet Explorer stopped listen when switch apps that only keep works listening Music internet Explorer into Desktop Mode use.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Foisel

customer_reviews.title: I must keep it plug in the wall to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: I must keep it plug in the wall to keep it charge. I have no ideal what to do? if I use the table it goes dead in a coup of hours.
customer_reviews.author: frank grieco

customer_reviews.title: Received USED item, with LOCKED ACCOUNT!
customer_reviews.text: NOT REFURBISHED - JUST USED! I just received this item, which I ordered as a gift for a family member for the holidays. Now it's too late to return it and get another, and I've discovered that there is some other person's account still associated with, and locking the OS. I cannot even reload the Windows software, because the previous owner (it seems Rodney) still has it locked. Total waste, very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but doesnt work as intended.
customer_reviews.text: First I ordered the 5000 series from Dell and the window store app stopped working, windows will not update, anti virus will not update. It's nothing but a headache. Before all that happened I ordered the 3000 series for someone else. I do not expect it to be any different. Wish I would have ordered an android. If your looking for a computer than I would get a computer. If your looking for a table to get on the internet, get email, play games get an android. Don't fight with Windows 8 on this small screen. It's no fun.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with windows 8
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the Dell Venue is using windows 8, while I will admit, this is my first windows 8 product, I know there will be a slight learning curve, however, once you set something up, its still not clear how to change it, spent the whole morning playing with it, while my Google device was up and running in a couple minutes, most of the time spend was upgrading software with no interaction required.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Johnson

customer_reviews.title: cannot use it my hands are too stiff and I ...
customer_reviews.text: cannot use it my hands are too stiff and I don't know what to do CAN I RETURN It ??c Can I return it? I cannot use the tablet because my fingers do not work because of swollen hands caused by arthritis
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Shima

product_meta.title: Dell Venue 8 Pro 3000 Series 32GB Windows Tablet
product_meta.description:
Introducing the new 8" lightweight Android tablet that's powerful, stylish and designed to entertain with a Full HD touch screen and award-winning audio.
